title: "RedWineBoxPlots"
author: "Michael Dong"
date: "2024-11-14"
output: html_document
---

Note: The box plot containing all attributes does not represent the visuals well,
      The attributes will be plotted individually.
```{r}
setwd(getwd())
library(tidyr)

wines_red <- read.csv("winequality-red.csv",header = FALSE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
# View(wines_red)
col_name <- strsplit(wines_red[1,], ";")[[1]]
col_name

wine_data <- data.frame(values = wines_red[-1,], stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
formatted_wine_data <- separate(wine_data, values,into=col_name, sep=";")
# View(formatted_wine_data)


# Convert each column to numeric
formatted_wine_data <- data.frame(lapply(formatted_wine_data, function(x) as.numeric(as.character(x))))
summary(formatted_wine_data[1:5])
summary(formatted_wine_data[6:9])
summary(formatted_wine_data[10:12])

# boxplot(formatted_wine_data[,c(1,4,10,11,12)],
#         outline = FALSE, names = col_name[c(1,4,10,11,12)], main = "red wine attributes")

boxplot(formatted_wine_data[,1],
        outline = FALSE, names = col_name[1], main = "red wine attributes (fixed acidity)")

boxplot(formatted_wine_data[,2],
        outline = FALSE, names = col_name[2], main = "red wine attributes (volatile acidity)")

boxplot(formatted_wine_data[,3],
        outline = FALSE, names = col_name[3], main = "red wine attributes (citric acid)")

boxplot(formatted_wine_data[,4],
        outline = FALSE, names = col_name[4], main = "red wine attributes (residual sugar)")

boxplot(formatted_wine_data[,5],
        outline = FALSE, names = col_name[5], main = "red wine attributes (chlorides)")

boxplot(formatted_wine_data[,6],
        outline = FALSE, names = col_name[6], main = "red wine attributes (free sulfer dioxide)")

boxplot(formatted_wine_data[,7],
        outline = FALSE, names = col_name[7], main = "red wine attributes (total sulfer dioxide)")

boxplot(formatted_wine_data[,8],
        outline = FALSE, names = col_name[8], main = "red wine attributes (density)")

boxplot(formatted_wine_data[,9],
        outline = FALSE, names = col_name[9], main = "red wine attributes (pH)")

boxplot(formatted_wine_data[,10],
        outline = FALSE, names = col_name[10], main = "red wine attributes (sulphates)")

boxplot(formatted_wine_data[,11],
        outline = FALSE, names = col_name[11], main = "red wine attributes (alcohol)")

boxplot(formatted_wine_data[,12],
        outline = FALSE, names = col_name[12], main = "red wine attributes (quality)")


boxplot(formatted_wine_data[,1],
        formatted_wine_data[,2],
        formatted_wine_data[,3],
        formatted_wine_data[,4],
        formatted_wine_data[,5],
        formatted_wine_data[,6],
        formatted_wine_data[,7],
        formatted_wine_data[,8],
        formatted_wine_data[,9],
        formatted_wine_data[,10],
        formatted_wine_data[,11],
        formatted_wine_data[,12],
        outline = FALSE, names = col_name, main = "red wine attributes")

```
